name: Park Tool TL-6.2 Steel Core Tire Levers - Pair
categories: TL-6.2 Steel Core Tire Levers - Pair
description: In the world of tire levers, these combine the best features: super stiff and super slippery. The strong steel core helps you remove even the tightest tires, and the smooth composite outer layer prevents unwanted scratches on your rims.Length is 12.7cm.Protruding steel tip engages the tire bead.Sold as a pair.
